title: Darke Heat
description: DEA Agent Bryce Prescott is back in Darke County to ask beautiful Page Conner for another one of her specially trained dogs so he can catch a drug lord who likes explosives. The only problem is, the last dog he borrowed ended up pregnant. Page is none too pleased to have Bryce coming back around. She still carries a grudge from him walking out on her when he thought she couldn't handle his profession. He took her dog, Sheba, with him and that has her seeing red; but when a dead body is found on her property she needs his help. Someone is out to get them and they have no choice but to team up and catch some killers.
author: Nese Ellyson
